mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(treatment_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as treatment_date, staff.staff_name, prescription.prescription_comment, medicine.medicine_kind, medicine.medicine_name from treatment, staff, prescription, medicine where treatment.staff_id = staff.staff_id and treatment.treatment_id = prescription.treatment_id and prescription.medicine_code = medicine.medicine_code and patient_id = #{patient_id}
